title: Scaling CDR Glyphs
body:
The scaling CDR runes (especially the Glyphs) are inconsistent with how much they claim to give.

Glyphs (per glyph) say they give 0.09% CDR per level with a cap at 1.67% at level 18, but 0.09% * 18 = 1.62%

Also I'm pretty sure when I was on the legacy client, it gave me another different percent.

I'd really like to know the true value so i can perfectly hit the cap.

replies.body: Glad somebody else noticed this. Also, when you put them into a rune page the total % at level 18 is off. For instance, with 6 scaling cdr glyphs at level 18 the total should be 10.02%, but the client adds it up to 9.7%

Apparently the Glyphs give like .09277% CDR per level or something like that.  So it does go up to the 10% with 6.

Still annoying that the client shows it as 9.7%
